void Buffer_Init ( uint8_t  type  ) 

Initialize buffer.

Parameters:
[in] type,: 
  • 0: Initialize Master_Buf with increment value from 0 Fill all member in Slave_Buf with 0
  • 1: Initialize Slave_Buf with increment value from 0 Fill all member in Master_Buf with 0
Returns:
None
